Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is thickly encrusted with a grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a number of lines of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394385) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394385)
